New mosque construction in India's Ayodhya to begin in May, Muslim group saysAs Hindu devotees prepare to inaugurate a grand temple to one of their holiest deities, India's minority Muslims plan to begin building a new mosque in the same city later this year, hoping to make a fresh start after a bloody, decades-long dispute. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 05:41:58 GMT RBUUKQ7EDBMKFJ3ABWXXQIT2LA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/new-mosque-construction-indias-ayodhya-begin-may-muslim-group-says-2024-01-20/Shivam Patel世界印度
Several hundred Honduran migrants prepare to travel north - local mediaSeveral hundred migrants have gathered at a bus terminal in northern Honduras in preparation to head towards the United States, local television reported on Friday, seeking to flee poverty and a lack of jobs in the Central American nation. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 04:25:14 GMT PPTRBDFOAZMUXELDS6YG5J2QIU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/several-hundred-honduran-migrants-prepare-travel-north-local-media-2024-01-20/Reuters世界美洲
Thousands of New Zealand Maori meet to discuss response to government plansMore than 10,000 New Zealand Maori congregated in the central North Island on Saturday to discuss how to respond to government plans that are seen by many Indigenous groups as undermining their rights and status. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 04:19:48 GMT TGCMDXEBRNOMZJZ3HYLQLC65NU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-new-zealand-maori-meet-discuss-response-government-plans-2024-01-20/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Fire in China school dorm kills 13 studentsA fire in a school dormitory in central China killed 13 students and injured another person, Chinese state media reported on Saturday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 02:11:09 GMT SQVMLFEEMBJAJDTE6ZUDOQTIDY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fire-school-dorm-china-kills-13-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中国
Western Australia in 'extreme' heat wave, raising bush fire riskParts of Western Australia were gripped on Saturday by an "extreme" heat-wave, raising the risk of bush fires in the vast state, the nation's weather forecaster said. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 00:57:18 GMT GGAIXFEIUJIDVET7JYO6CN3Z7U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/western-australia-extreme-heatwave-alert-raise-bushfire-risk-2024-01-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Fire in Panama's largest landfill blows toxic smoke over capitalA large blaze at a garbage dump outside Panama City blew a toxic smoke in the country's capital on Friday, forcing evacuations as firefighters battled to put out the flames that authorities said were likely caused by arson the night before. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:37:50 GMT GADNCLB73FNJHJ2IM6K5DOF5HA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/fire-panamas-largest-landfill-blows-有毒-烟-over-capital-2024-01-19/Reuters世界美洲
Biden hopeful for bipartisan package in Senate on U.S.-Mexico border next weekPresident Joe Biden signaled on Friday that he is hopeful a deal over the U.S.-Mexico border could be worked out next week at least in the Democratic-controlled Senate, and said he was ready to embrace "massive changes." Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:01:08 GMT WYTW3YF7BBI7VDM3GYQNCXVAC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/biden-hopeful-bipartisan-package-senate-us-mexico-border-next-week-2024-01-19/Andrea Shalal, Katharine Jackson世界美洲
Ethnic killings in one Sudan city left up to 15,000 dead - UN reportBetween 10,000 and 15,000 people were killed in one city in Sudan's West Darfur region last year in ethnic violence by the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) and allied Arab militia, according to a United Nations report seen by Reuters on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:54:28 GMT SX3KGKDGDJLZRFIH27UCFVO4II https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethnic-killings-one-sudan-city-left-up-15000-dead-un-report-2024-01-19/Michelle Nichols, Maggie Michael世界非洲
Army called in to rescue about 600 Spanish motorists stuck in snowArmy units were mobilised to help about 600 drivers who were stuck on a motorway in heavy snow as Storm Juan blanketed many parts of Spain, authorities said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:53:04 GMT YPL3MZ3FT5MLRFHIL2CRBPJZYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/army- Called-rescue-about-600-spanish-motorists-stuck-snow-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan's PM urges US to take lead in ending Gaza "carnage"The United States and other top powers need to use their influence with Israel to end the ongoing "carnage" in Gaza, Jordan's Prime Minister, Bisher al Khasawaneh, said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:00:37 GMT NT6GPVE5QRPYJHLF3CHSBWBID4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordans-pm-urges-us-take-lead-ending-gaza-carnage-2024-01-19/Marc Jones世界中东
US Democrats push Biden administration over civilian toll in Israel's Gaza campaignDozens of President Joe Biden's fellow Democrats signed a letter on Friday urging his administration to reaffirm that the U.S. strongly opposes "the forced and permanent displacement" of Palestinians from Gaza. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 20:53:12 GMT 4JJYFTCEFNO3XK372QR7RHU5QU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-democrats-push-biden-over-civilian-toll-israels-gaza-campaign-2024-01-19/Patricia Zengerle世界
